title: Test/fix Additional Built-in Tasks
body:
To build CoreFX/Roslyn repos, we will need to implement the following tasks (in addition to #184). This work will be started in Sprint 89, but likely not finished.
- AssignCulture
- AssignProjectConfiguration
- AssignTargetPath
- CallTarget
- CreateCSharpManifestResourceName
- CreateVisualBasicManifestResourceName
- FindAppConfigFile
- GenerateBindingRedirects
- GenerateResource
- GetFrameworkPath
- GetReferenceAssemblyPaths
- MSBuild
- ResolveAssemblyReference
- ResolveCodeAnalysisRuleSet
- ResolveKeySource
- SetEnvironmentVariable
- Touch
- WriteCodeFragment
